content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'corner2': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

### Image Description
The image shows a black 3D printed structure with a red circle highlighting a middle section, likely a corner of the groove.

### Stiffness Matrix Calculation
The highlighted section is a corner transition point. To manage transitions smoothly, uniform stiffness is applied in all directions.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
